history.content: That sounds like an awful lot to me. Please note it's an 8 week session instead of the normal 16 weeks, so each class will go approximately twice as fast.

children.subject:
I've been on the course staff for 61c over the summer. I would advise you against taking it with anything else unless you routinely take 4 or more technicals in a semester. 

Edit - Actually, if you've taken a courseload like 7A + 70 + 61B + Breadth, and done well, you could probably do 7B + 61C over the summer. But it wouldn't be pleasant.

history.content: How feasible is it to take both courses over the summer. They are both in Session C. Is the workload going to be too much? I would be in class everyday from 9:30 am to 5 pm.
history.subject: CS 61C +  Physics 7B Over Summer
